subject: Sports Injuries
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Toronto Blue Jays placed infielder Jayson Nix on the disabled list with a bruised left shin and called up infielder Mike McCoy from Class AAA Las Vegas.
snippet: The Toronto Blue Jays placed infielder Jayson Nix on the disabled list with a bruised left shin and called up infielder Mike McCoy from Class AAA Las Vegas.
